text: [Music]
there are about 147
million americans who have one or more
chronic conditions
the most common ones tend to be heart
disease diabetes weight management
behavioral health
chronic pain and chronic conditions
represent about 90 percent of the spend
in our healthcare system today machine
learning and applied health signals are
at the core
of our product and our business at
levongo we
use lich data border members collected
from a variety of hardware sensors out
in the real world
like our blood glucose meter or smart
watches we use this data to understand
using machine learning what's the best
way to support a particular member
and what type of interventions are going
to have the biggest impact
in helping them manage their condition
and ultimately their clinical outcomes
over the long term
the amazon transcribe tool helped us
transcribe tens of thousands of coach
conversations
that our members are having so we can
use natural language processing
to understand what does a member talk
about what are some of the challenges
that they're having
and what is the best way to support them
through a variety of different
interactions and personalize their care
every time you take your blood glucose
meter
maybe you're saying that hey i'm
stressed i'm anxious i need help right
now
and we're taking these insights from
these different disparate
sources which previously in healthcare
were never integrated
you're combining them together and then
saying
here's the best next nudge that we
should send this person
because that's the best way to get them
to manage their condition
those machine learning models that are
running in production every day
for hundreds of thousands of our members
have delivered over four million nudges
the value of our partnership with aws is
being able to scale
by taking advantage of the platform
capabilities that aws offers us
we can focus on the parts of the problem
that are the most relevant and
challenging and interesting for us
given our business
